metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16831 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Smarty before 3.1.33-dev-4 allows attackers to bypass the trusted_dir protection mechanism via a file:./../ substring in an include statement.

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.33+20180830.1.3a78a21f+selfpack1-1').
